short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Compare product prices from various e-commerce sites. Set up your SerpAPI key in settings.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Description:

"PriceCompare" is a powerful browser extension designed to help you effortlessly compare prices of products across multiple e-commerce websites. With a single click, it scans popular online stores and presents you with a comprehensive list of price options for the item you are interested in. The extension automatically highlights the best deals, allowing you to make informed purchasing decisions.

Features include:

Real-time price tracking: Stay updated with the latest prices for your favorite products.
Cross-platform comparison: Compare prices from top e-commerce platforms like Amazon, eBay, Walmart, and more.
Price history insights: View historical price trends to ensure you're getting the best deal at the right time.
Notifications and alerts: Receive alerts when prices drop or when special discounts are available.
Easy-to-use interface: Quick and seamless integration with your browser for a smooth shopping experience.
Whether you're a bargain hunter or simply looking for the best deal, PriceCompare ensures you never miss an opportunity to save.
